title: Ticket #558: add ability to search in user specified fields.
description:
On the search page, I would like an additional checkbox for each user defined field that has been specified, specifically extra1, which is the rust field. Oftentimes I want to see if a rust ticket has an associated gittrac ticket, but since the extra1 field, where we keep the ticket number, isn't searched by default, I can't easily look.

It'd be nice if there were additional check boxes which held the symbolic name of the extra fields that I could check and have the search also act there as well. Of course, the check boxes should only appear when the fields are actually used.
